document_data.mainbody:
The Fey domain was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like clerics with spells and powers associated with fey.
The cleric gained resistance to the spell-like powers of fey creatures.
Novice spellcasters were able to use the faerie fire, charm person, and inspired aim spells. Clerics of some experience could cast blinding beauty, tree stride, and heroes feast. Those that were masters of this domain had access to liveoak, unearthly beauty, and summon natures ally IX.
